channel.title: [Lore suggestion] Boslof the Great Part 2: The Teaser
channel.description:
In a deep dark time before the great war happened a researcher named braixen discovered the lies about master boslof. He took them as the truth of what happened. But then they found were he keeps his slaves. Master boslof quickly discovered that they were on to something and silenced the researchers and silenced braixen. No one knows of the operation that took place until 50 years later.............
A man met the thought to be dead braixen
Braixen: There is one thing you should know about me I specialize in a specific type of research. Boslof research. ?: Your talking about him
_Inception horns_
?: Mr Braixen has a job offer he would like to discuss with you. ?: What, a kind of work placement.
_Inception Horns_
Braixen: Not exactly
Braixen: We create the world of the Boslof. Braixen: We bring the slaves into that world and they fill it with their master.
?: Then you break in and kill him?
Braixen: Well, its not strictly speaking legal.
_Inception Horns_
Braixen: Its called Bosleption
_Inception Horns_
Braixen: Merik....
Braixen: I think I found a way home
Braixen: And this last assassination thats how I get there
Braixen: Boslof feels real while we are near him.
Braixen: Its only when we wake up we are in his dungeon
?: THIS IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY
_Inception Horns_
?: THE BOSLOF IS COLLAPSING
Braixen: I have it under control
_Inception Horns Fade_

item.title: [Lore suggestion] Boslof the Great Part 2: The Teaser
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
In a deep dark time before the great war happened a researcher named braixen discovered the lies about master boslof. He took them as the truth of what happened. But then they found were he keeps his slaves. Master boslof quickly discovered that they were on to something and silenced the researchers and silenced braixen. No one knows of the operation that took place until 50 years later…

A man met the thought to be dead braixen

Braixen: There is one thing you should know about me I specialize in a specific type of research. Boslof research.
?: Your talking about him

Inception horns

?: Mr Braixen has a job offer he would like to discuss with you.
?: What, a kind of work placement.

Inception Horns

Braixen: Not exactly

Braixen: We create the world of the Boslof.
Braixen: We bring the slaves into that world and they fill it with their master.

?: Then you break in and kill him?

Braixen: Well, its not strictly speaking legal.

Inception Horns

Braixen: Its called Bosleption

Inception Horns

Braixen: Merik…

Braixen: I think I found a way home

Braixen: And this last assassination thats how I get there

Braixen: Boslof feels real while we are near him.

Braixen: Its only when we wake up we are in his dungeon

?: THIS IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY

Inception Horns

?: THE BOSLOF IS COLLAPSING

Braixen: I have it under control

Inception Horns Fade

Read full topic
